articles.title: NASA's Webb Telescope Reveals Long-Studied Star Is Actually A Twin - NDTV
articles.description: This discovery, made using Webb's MIRI, was presented at the 244th meeting of the American Astronomical Society on June 12.
articles.content:
The combined findings suggest that the twin stars are approaching the end of this early stage
NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed Webb's Mid-Infrared Instrument (MIRI) through its launch, which… [+2097 chars]
